description.message: Simple shortcuts for moving tabs to new windows

pop-this-tab.description: Menu item for Poptabs > This tab

pop-tabs-to-the-right.message: This tab and tabs to the right
pop-tabs-to-the-right.description: Menu item for Poptabs > This tab and tabs to the right

poptabs_this_command.message: Pop active tab into a new window

poptabs_right_command.message: Pop active tab + tabs to right into a new window
